text: This is a list of constituencies () located in Spain. Spain uses multi-member constituencies for elections to the Cortes Generales, regional legislatures and the European Parliament. Spain has one European Parliament constituency. ==Cortes Generales== ===Congress of Deputies=== * A Coruña * Álava * Albacete * Alicante * Almería * Asturias * Ávila * Badajoz * Balearic Islands *
